hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu 'Abdur-Rahman Al Juhani that the Messenger of Allah(ﷺ) said:"I am riding to the Jews tomorrow. Do not initiate the greeting with them, and if they greet you, then say: Wa 'alaikum (and also upon you)

chapter.ara-name: باب رَدِّ السَّلاَمِ عَلَى أَهْلِ الذِّمَّةِ
chapter.eng-name: Returning (the greeting of) peace to Ahludh-Dhimmah(Non Muslim living under the protectio
